attributes.name: Strength (STR)
attributes.description: Physical power, endurance, and carrying capacity.

attributes.name: Constitution (CON)
attributes.description: Physical resilience, stamina, and resistance to injury/poison.

attributes.name: Dexterity (DEX)
attributes.description: Agility, reflexes, and coordination for stealth and finesse.

attributes.name: Intelligence (INT)
attributes.description: Analytical aptitude, puzzle-solving, and arcane/scientific understanding.

attributes.name: Sanity (SAN)
attributes.description: Mental stability and resistance to psychological trauma.

attributeGeneration.method: Roll 3d10 x 10 for each attribute (30% to 90%) and allocate as desired.

sanitySystem.description: Sanity is tested when confronting horrifying events. Roll d100 under your current SAN score to resist.

consequences.effect: Character succumbs to madness and is removed from play.

skills.untrainedPenalty: +20% penalty to the roll (making success harder).
skills.startingValue: Base percentage determined by the associated Attribute.

usfrNotes: The core mechanical loop is a Universal D100 roll-under system. The character creation process is a detailed point-buy/allocation system focused on balancing the six core attributes and their associated skills. The primary unique mechanic is the Sanity system, which must be visually tracked and integrated into the character sheet. The six D100 attributes have been mapped to the Universal Pentagram/Alignment keys for system consistency.
